channel.title: Ubuntu Web Application :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources phpBB Installation from phpBB How To Set Up A Remote Database to Optimize Site Performance with MySQL on Ubuntu 20.04 from DigitalOcean (works for 24.04) Video Transcript In this video, I’ll discuss the steps you’ll need to follow in order to install a new web application that uses PHP and MySQL on the environment we created in the last video. As with the previous videos discussing web applications on a Windows server, you’ll have to adapt these steps to match the application you are installing and the particular configuration of your environment.
